author: John Ferrara
comment: Nice face but how do you get dim mode to work? I have a huawei watch. Also Jan on the month sub dial should be Jun.

author: John Soccer
comment: Great
title: Greatness!

comment: Forced to rate to see it ?

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: Nobody is forcing you to do anything.  Leaving a rating is optional.  What makes you think that?  Just like any app you just need to tap on another part of your screen to make most dialogue boxes go away.  If there is a bug we will fix it but you're going to have to email us to determine that.  Forzaonestudios@gmail.com .  Thanks

author: Janet Diederich
comment: Fine

author: Deimos Jang
comment: Nice work. But could you remove the 'Digital 2.0' words in the corner? If you can, I will give you 4 stars. If you could give me an option to change the color, I will give you 5 stars!  I don't think it's bribing you. It's encouragement. When I installed it, there was no way to remove the words 'Digital 2.0' in the corner. That's why I wrote this review. I didn't update my review because I uninstall this watchface several days after I posted this review and didn't get any response. In order to fulfill my promise, I installed it again and yes, it's gone now. Now you have 4 stars.

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: UPDATE:  Thanks Deimos, glad you like it better now.

author: Jim Richardson
comment: This is the best looking watchface I've downloaded and it looks great on my Samsung Gear Live. I'm very happy with it thus far.

author: Brandon Gaona
comment: Best looking watch in the app store by far.... Very good in dimmed and regular mode! Could do without the Digital 2.0 in the corner though.
